post.description: activateCustomerV4() REST API is used to create pre provisioned accounts, activates subscription for existing accounts, deactivates the subscription. This API also holds the eligibility rules mechanism.
sendOTP() REST API is used to send OTP to the customer mobile number.

post.description: confirmOTP() REST API checks whether customer entered OTP valid or not.
